name: Amazing Balloon Blitz Adventure
description:
It's a dangerous world for a carefree balloon!

Amazing Balloon Blitz Adventure is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help your balloon character avoid the dangerous flying obstacles that could make his world explode!

How long can you float through the air? Can you collect enough gems along the way? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for flying darts and fireballs!

Collect enough gems and you can unlock more balloon characters for even more fun!

*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect gems to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch

Download Amazing Balloon Blitz Adventure right now while it's 100% FREE!
